Any dispute arising out of your use of PixelPlay shall be resolved in the courts of this jurisdiction. Limitation of Liability In no event shall PixelPlay or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on PixelPlay, even if PixelPlay or a PixelPlay authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Disclaimer, please contact us at pixelplay@gmail.com. pages.privacy-policy: PixelPlay - Privacy Policy: How We Protect Your Data and Privacy +91-932-2800100 pixelplay@gmail.com PixelPlay Home Releases Updates Council Join Privacy Policy Additional Information We Collect In addition to the information described above, we may also collect the following types of information about you: Cookies and other tracking technologies: We use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about your use of the Services, such as your browsing history, search history, and preferences. We may also use these technologies to deliver targeted advertising to you. You can control the use of cookies and other tracking technologies through your browser settings, but please note that disabling these technologies may limit your ability to use certain features of the Services. Location information: We may collect information about your location, such as your IP address, GPS coordinates, or Wi-Fi network information, when you use the Services. We may use this information to provide you with location-based services, such as showing you nearby gaming events or providing you with personalized content. Payment information: If you make a purchase through the Services, we may collect your payment information, such as your credit card number, billing address, and other payment-related information. We use this information to process your payment and fulfill your order. How We Use Your Information for Advertising We may use your information to deliver targeted advertising to you, such as by showing you ads for games or other products that we think may be of interest to you. We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing history, search history, and preferences, and we may use this information to deliver ads that are more relevant to you. We may also use your information to measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns. Your Ad Choices You can control the use of your information for advertising purposes by adjusting your privacy settings on your device or browser. You can also opt out of targeted advertising by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance's Consumer Choice page or the Network Advertising Initiative's opt-out page. Please note that even if you opt out of targeted advertising, you may still see ads on the Services, but they may not be as relevant to you. Data Retention We will retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with the Services. We may also retain your information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. Your Rights Depending on your location and applicable law, you may have certain rights with respect to your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete your information, or the right to object to or restrict certain processing of your information. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at pixelplay@gmail.com. Please note that we may need to verify your identity before we can process your request. Third-Party Links and Services The Services may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by PixelPlay. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information to them. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at pixelplay@gmail.com. We will do our best to respond to your inquiry in a timely and helpful manner. Thank you for using PixelPlay! We hope that this Privacy Policy helps you understand how we collect, use, and disclose your information, and how you can control your privacy preferences. If you have any feedback or suggestions for how we can improve our data practices, please let us know. We value your input and are committed to providing a safe and enjoyable experience for all of our users.
